summary: Implements the entry point for the Mission Support System graphical user interface. It parses command‑line options, configures logging, reads user configuration, checks for software updates, initializes a Qt application, creates the main window that can host multiple view and tool panes, and provides utilities for opening, saving and switching flight track files.
business_intent: Offer aerospace mission planners and analysts an interactive desktop application to visualise, edit and manage flight trajectory data and related tools within a flexible multi‑window Qt environment.
